title: Discrete Structures
subtitle: Learn logic, sets, relations, graphs, and more

topics.title: Set Theory
topics.description: Operations on sets, Venn diagrams, Cartesian products.

topics.title: Logic and Propositional Calculus
topics.description: Propositions, logical connectives, truth tables, and implications.

topics.title: Relations and Functions
topics.description: Types of relations, properties, composition, and functions.

topics.title: Mathematical Induction
topics.description: Principle of induction and its applications.

topics.title: Graph Theory
topics.description: Types of graphs, representations, and graph traversals.

topics.title: Recurrence Relations
topics.description: Solving linear recurrence relations with and without initial conditions.
